Reviews.Title: Good Build Quality
Reviews.Author: James J. Barnes
Reviews.Content: The design of the pistol grips is well balanced and solid grip rubber jacketed. The articulating arm is well equipped with widgets that should fit what you have in mind. The one draw back is the ball joint swivel seems a little loosey goosey. I'm still new to it and in fairness, this may not actually be an operational problem. It's the only con.

Reviews.Title: Great for my GoPro
Reviews.Author: Bernie T
Reviews.Content: I am using this with my GoPro 2 in combination with the Neewer 160 LED Light. It works great so far.It was weird as when i received the package, there was an ebay sellers receipt inside and no documentation, no instructions for use, etc. Just the 3 components -- everything was wrapped and in perfect condition, it just didn't feel 'official'.Otherwise, a great purchase...

ProductInfo.Features:
The new Photography and Cinema Pistol Grip is the only camera handle grip available with a wide platform.
The large plastic molded handle makes working with small cameras more ergonomic and stable when shooting video.
A rubber platform prevents slippage when the camera is mounted to the stage using the standard 1/4x20 threaded stud.
The included threaded D-Ring allows the PNC Handle to be attached to a carabiner which in turn can be hooked onto keyrings, keychains, belt loops, etc.
A small metal insert below the handle allows you to attach a PNC friction arm for carrying an extra accessory such as an LED light, Microphone, or Portable audio recorder.
ProductInfo.Name: (2x) Authentic P&C Camera DSLR pistol grip handle with (1x) 11" Friction Magic Arm
